name: Rootin' Tootin' Potato Shootin'
description:
Based on the platforming game "Potato Ninja," Rootin' Tootin' Potato Shootin'  (RTPS) provides a multiplayer action-adventure game like no other. Choose  your team, join a battlefield, and rack up experience points as you improve  your survival skills. How long can you last? Objective The objective of the game is to stay alive as long as possible to improve your personal score while defeating opponents to score points for your team. Teams are represented by the character images. Controls Move Left and Right - Arrow Keys
Jump - Up Arrow Key
Fire Potatoes - 'W' , 'S', and 'D' Keys
Leave Battlefield/Leave Lobby - 'Escape' Key
Chat - 'Enter' Key FAQ Q: How do I login?
A: To login, you must create an account with Game Maker Server. You can create the account directly within the game, but you would need to go online to change your password. Q: How do I change teams?
A: Changing teams is easy. Either click on your character icon or the store icon to be brought to the appropriate menu. From there click on the skin you want and return to the main lobby. Q: What's up with the store?
A: The store is a work in progress and will not be fully operational until the game's official launch. As a thank you for beta testing, all prices have temporarily been set to zero. Be sure to take advantage of this offer! Q: When will the game launch?
A: We currently do not have a set launch date, as we are reliant on a specific update to GameMaker Server to provide store functionality and multi-platform support, but we are working behind the scenes to prepare for this update.
